Introduction

Lynn is a Japanese dancer and singer under MODHAUS.

On December 21, 2023, Lynn was introduced as the seventeenth member of the girl group tripleS. She first released the single "Just Do It" as part of the sub-unit NXT, before officially debuting with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, Lynn was placed in the sub-units NXT and Visionary Vision.
